languages.text: "Не переступай черты, или будешь наказана за богохульство, ведьма. На мне лежит благословение Неумирающего, а не порча, которой запятнана ты".
"Hold your tongue or you will be punished for blasphemy, witch. I have the blessing of the Undying One upon me, not the perversity with which you are tainted."
languages.original_text: "Не переступай черты, или будешь наказана за богохульство, ведьма. На мне лежит благословение Неумирающего, а не порча, которой запятнана ты".

traits.locale_text: "Hold your tongue or you will be punished for blasphemy, witch. I have the blessing of the Undying One upon me, not the perversity with which you are tainted."
"Hold your tongue or you will be punished for blasphemy, witch. I have the blessing of the Undying One upon me, not the perversity with which you are tainted."

"Hold your tongue or you will be punished for blasphemy, witch. I have the blessing of the Undying One upon me, not the perversity with which you are tainted."

languages.text: «Contenga su lengua o será castigada por blasfemia, bruja. Es el Inmortal quien me ha bendecido, no la perversión que mancilla su propia alma».
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue or you will be punished for blasphemy, witch. I have the blessing of the Undying One upon me, not the perversity with which you are tainted."

traits.locale_text: «Contenga su lengua o será castigada por blasfemia, bruja. Es el Inmortal quien me ha bendecido, no la perversión que mancilla su propia alma».

languages.text: 「口を慎め、さもなくば冒涜の罪で罰するぞ、魔女め。私には不死の者の加護があるのであって、お前のような異常者とは違う」
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue or you will be punished for blasphemy, witch. I have the blessing of the Undying One upon me, not the perversity with which you are tainted."

traits.locale_text: 「口を慎め、さもなくば冒涜の罪で罰するぞ、魔女め。私には不死の者の加護があるのであって、お前のような異常者とは違う」

languages.text: “把嘴闭上，女巫，否则我就要为你亵渎神明的言语而惩罚你。我身上带着的是不死之神的祝福，不是你沾染的邪恶污秽。”
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue or you will be punished for blasphemy, witch. I have the blessing of the Undying One upon me, not the perversity with which you are tainted."

traits.locale_text: “把嘴闭上，女巫，否则我就要为你亵渎神明的言语而惩罚你。我身上带着的是不死之神的祝福，不是你沾染的邪恶污秽。”

languages.text: "Hütet Eure Zunge oder Ihr werdet wegen Blasphemie bestraft, Hexe. Ich habe den Segen des Todlosen, nicht die Perversion, mit der Ihr befleckt seid."
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue or you will be punished for blasphemy, witch. I have the blessing of the Undying One upon me, not the perversity with which you are tainted."

traits.locale_text: "Hütet Eure Zunge oder Ihr werdet wegen Blasphemie bestraft, Hexe. Ich habe den Segen des Todlosen, nicht die Perversion, mit der Ihr befleckt seid."

languages.text: « Tenez votre langue ou je vous ferai condamner pour blasphème, sorcière. Mon don est une bénédiction de l'Immortel et n'a rien à voir avec la perversion qui vous ronge. »
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue or you will be punished for blasphemy, witch. I have the blessing of the Undying One upon me, not the perversity with which you are tainted."

traits.locale_text: « Tenez votre langue ou je vous ferai condamner pour blasphème, sorcière. Mon don est une bénédiction de l'Immortel et n'a rien à voir avec la perversion qui vous ronge. »

languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue or you will be punished for blasphemy, witch. I have the blessing of the Undying One upon me, not the perversity with which you are tainted."

languages.text: "Diline hâkim olmazsan dine aykırılıktan cezalandırılırsın cadı. Üzerimde senin kendini kirlettiğin o sapkınlığı değil, Ölmeyen'in lütfunu taşıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue or you will be punished for blasphemy, witch. I have the blessing of the Undying One upon me, not the perversity with which you are tainted."
